name: jhost
description:
Use WASD to move, when you get goop you can click to throw it. Different colours of goop do different things.

Don't stay in the light for too long!

Just a heads up, these lights are super intensive and will probably break everything in the web version. If you want to try a version that doesn't slow to a crawl, there's a PC build as well you can download, but I can't gurantee it'll work on all machines.
